data.name: Senior Full Stack Programmer
data.description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Building new feature & maintaining core system website both frontend and backend side
Optimize system code and flow
Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using the best software development practices
Ability to implement analityc tracking
Kualifikasi
Hands on experience with various programing languages like Go, Nodejs, Vue js, PHP, and JS
Hands on experience with RDBMS (MySql, Postgre) and NoSQL (MongoDB)
Knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming
Experience in maintaining e-commerce site
Source Code Management like Git
Able to communicate and coordinate with the team
Learn and adapt to new technology implemented to support company core business
Creative, Innovative, and able to work in dynamic working environment
Share knowledge and experience to team

data.name: Junior Security & System Engineer
data.description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Daily Monitoring SIEM and security protection in the Server (on-premises and cloud).
Configure and Monitor Agent SIEM on-premises and Cloud.
Check Firewall activity on DC by Sophos UTM Log analyzer.
Report and escalated any activity related to security in daily operational
Execute action plan such as planning Preventive Maintenance time and implement changes management for any change activity in the team.
Collaborate with other departments and vendors related to IT security operations and scheduled regular vulnerability scans and penetration tests for new systems/applications.
Kualifikasi
What do you need?

Familiar with security verification penetration testing (Kali, Metasploit, Nessus, Wireshark, etc).
Understanding of security framework (NIST 800-53).
Very good knowledge of Linux and Windows systems.
High attention to detail.
Self-starter & growth mindset.
Good in English.
Required Skills

Linux Server
Network Security
Windows Server
Information security

data.name: Technical Consultant
data.description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
PT Metrodata Electronics, TBK (Digitial Solution Provider & Technology Innovator) would like to invite you to be part of the company to develop yourself and your skills. So letâ€™s apply for the following open positions and have career with us.

Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate/Professional Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology, Software engineer, or equivalent.
At least 1 years of experience in working with database, ETL processes and data integrations.
Familiar with postgreSQL, REST API, flat file
Familiar with basic of linux, unix or microsoft azure are considered an asset.
Analytical and problem solving skills
Able to speak and write in English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Able to work in team, fast learner, creative, self motivated and communicative.
Able to work with minimum supervision
Willing to travel to customer site in Jakarta / outside Jakarta for certain period.
 

Kualifikasi
Job Description :

Design, Develop, Analyze, troubleshooting related Web Development.
Involved in all aspects of the development lifecycle, including development, Testing, UAT, deployment, warranty, and post-warranty bug fixes.
Conduct analysis and problem solving of application accuracy, application dependency, reporting and technical function.

data.name: Software Quality Assurance
data.description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Develop the optimal test case and write clean automation test code
Review and analyze test results to ensure software quality and maintainability
Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders in a clear and timely fashion about product development status
Kualifikasi
Minimum of 2-4 years' work experience in Software Quality Assurance
Knowledge of software development, integration, QA methodology & release process
Experience conducting manual & automated tests on more than one platform: Mobile Web, Android, iOS or API
Up to date with Java language
Experience with DB tools is a must; DBeaver, Mysql, SQL Server, Postman
Experience with automation script; Selenium, Appium, Cucumber
Experience working with JIRA, Test and Defect Management tools
Experience doing stress test is a plus
Experience and knowledge or testing of Kafka or data stream is a plus
Familiar with Scrum framework
Responsible, and able to work independently or in a team
Have a passion in the development of information technology

data.name: Software Development Engineer
data.description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Software Development Engineer (or simply Software Engineer) develops software. This is done not only by writing code but also with the right design (micro) and architecture (macro), with a mindset toward operation maintainability.

Areas of responsibility in this position are:

Full-stack web/mobile application development with a variety of coding languages.
Create consumer products and features using an internal programming language.
Work closely with our Product Manager and Product Design teams to define feature specifications and build the next generation of products leveraging frameworks such as React & React Native.
Work closely with operations and infrastructure to build and scale back-end services.
Build report interfaces and data feeds.
Turn design into code.
Kualifikasi
Understanding of Java, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, or other relevant coding languages.
Knowledge of building large-scale infrastructure applications.
Excellent problem-solving skills.
Experience in working on large-scale applications.
Understanding of performance optimization at the application level.
Good understanding of relational databases and MySQL.
